about_the_game:
Before we get into the description of the game, I'm going to list a few things the game doesn't have.



  • This is a sandbox where you are free to do and build anything you want. There is no end goal. The only limit is your imagination.
  • There is no management, economy, or timers involved in the game. It's a pure sandbox game where you are free to do and build anything.
  • There is no story. Imagine or create a story through what you build in the game.

Okay description time.



Have you ever wanted to just build your own little fantasy world, a farm, some kind of castle, or just an epic fantasy city, without worrying about managing your economy, maintaining the happiness of your people, or gaining enough XP to unlock a building? BUILD is the game for you! Build & design your own fantasy world using over 600+ items, in this relaxing sandbox building game. No missions, no objectives, no timers. Just stress-free building, and good vibes. Stack, connect, or overlap objects to create unique combinations. Build whatever you like, whenever you like, however you like. The possibilities are endless!

Features



  • Over 600+ items designed by various artists, to build & create with! - with more continuously being added in each major update.
  • Stack & merge items to create unique combinations.
  • Add life to your world with people, animals, giants, and even dragons.
  • Build your own land.
  • Command people to do various tasks.
  • Rotate items at any angle.
  • Build instantly - No wait times, timers, or XP.
  • Rotate, zoom, or pan the camera at any angle.
  • View worlds created by other players.
  • Search & download worlds from other players.
  • Huge world - You will never run out of space for building.
  • Cross-play - Save your world to the cloud and play while on the move with our mobile version, Pocket BUILD.
  • Pugs - Do you like Pugs? Well great, this game has a Pug.
  • Bugs - Lot's of cool bugs with more bugs added every update!

Things currently being developed:


We plan to release all these features slowly over regular updates.

  • Multiplayer - Explore & build worlds with your friends.
  • Swimming in first-person mode.
  • Riding horses, dragons, boats, and vehicles in first-person mode.
  • Going inside buildings in first-person mode.
  • Zombie survival mode. Survive hoards of zombies in your world.
  • And loads more! Join us on Discord to make your suggestions
